message:
Last update: I got it working. It's live [here](https://jessecambon.github.io/2020/07/15/tidygeocoder-1-0-0.html). From the leaflet.html file, I had to remove the flatly.js library because it messed up the code block syntax highlighting and I removed the viewport because it changed the width of the site. I also had an issue with white grid lines showing up on the leaflet tiles, but that was fixed by moving the include statement for leaflet.html down a bit in the head.html file.

Thanks for the help!
message_html:
Last update: I got it working. Itâ€™s live here. From the leaflet.html file, I had to remove the flatly.js library because it messed up the code block syntax highlighting and I removed the viewport because it changed the width of the site. I also had an issue with white grid lines showing up on the leaflet tiles, but that was fixed by moving the include statement for leaflet.html down a bit in the head.html file.

Thanks for the help!
